alert.note: Alert for Box Butte; Sioux (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 22 at 8:56PM CDT until June 22 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cheyenne has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Box Butte County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... Southeastern Sioux County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... * Until 845 PM MDT. * At 755 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Kilpatrick Lake, or 19 miles northeast of Scottsbluff, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Kilpatrick Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
